compatibility.notes: The ESA-PL-strong-copyleft-2.4 license requires that any derivative works or combined works must also be licensed under the same license, ensuring that the freedoms granted by the license are preserved.

key_requirements: Ensure that the source code is accessible to users.
Include the full text of the license with any distribution.
Maintain the copyright notice in all copies.
Document any changes made to the original code.
Distribute derivative works under the same license terms.
license.name: ESA-PL-strong-copyleft-2.4
obligations: Source code must be made available when distributing modified versions.
License must be included with all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Copyright notice must be included in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
Any modifications must be clearly stated.
Derived works must be licensed under the same license.
